name: I-LIVE-ON StoryTeller
summary: Learn about .ILO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: I-LIVE-ON is a multiplatform software suite that allows users to create and watch stories. While users can create stories on any topic, I-LIVE-ON is designed to be used to record a person's life history as a story, which can be shared with friends and loved ones.

Users create I-LIVE-ON stories in I-LIVE-ON.Creator, a Windows and macOS application. These stories are saved as ILO files. All I-LIVE-ON applications, including the free I-LIVE-ON.NowStory Player App (available for Windows and macOS) and the paid I-LIVE-ON.VR-Theater player (available for Meta Quest VR Headset), can open ILO files and play the story they contain.

description: An ILO file is a story created and used by the I-LIVE-ON application suite, including I-LIVE-ON.Creator, I-LIVE-ON.NowStory, and I-LIVE-ON.VR-Theater. Typically, ILO stories are a record of a person's life and are Zip-compressed, containing audio, video, text, image, and GEnealogical Data COMmunications (GEDCOM) data.

instructions: You can open an ILO file with the I-LIVE-ON suite of applications, most of which are available for Windows and macOS. For example, I-LIVE-ON.Creator allows you to open and edit ILO files; I-LIVE-ON.NowStory allows you to watch the story an ILO file contains.
